title: Healing Point Wellness Center
author: Healing Point Wellness Center
description: We invite you to heal your mind, body, and spirit naturally!
cleaned_text: Traditional Chinese Medicine, or TCM, is a medicine that originated in ancient China and has continued to evolve over thousands of years. TCM includes various treatment modalities such as acupuncture, herbal medicine, mind-body exercises, and more, in order to promote optimal health and wellness. According to the World Health Organization, acupuncture has been proven to be effective in the treatment of various conditions/concerns. As research continues, this list expands. Check out the link below for An Overview of Scientific Evidence.
